Senior HSE Field Engineer for Integrated Projects                                  May 2018 –August 2020 
Schlumberger                                                                                         Barmer & Vijayawada, India               
3 Projects:  1 Offshore & 2 Onshore Lump sum Turnkey Operations 
Ensuring that operations are delivered safe and efficient through the implementation of standards, 
strategies, processes & programs to the projects in order to maintain a good HSE and Operation 
integrity performance of our contractors. LTI Free & Zero Automotive incidents
▪Onboarding of the Rig contractors & Safety Design during the execution phase of the project. 
▪Create the HSE plan , Emergency response plan and process safety documents for the project.
▪Implement the HSE Management System in compliance with Client specific standards
▪Manage contractors and all subcontractors based on approval and compliance 
▪Develop Power Bi Dashboard for HSE and Operation integrity KPI performance monitoring
▪Lead the risk assessment and design for safety during the start up of the project
▪Create the Project Bridging document with client and contractor for all pre -qualifications
▪Conduct  HAZOP sessions and lead the Risk assessment for offshore and onshore operations
▪Coordinate all Statuary, Regulatory & environmental compliance for the c lient
▪Lead SIMOPS session with Client, contractors and Product Lines
▪Implement safe work procedures and work instructions to drilling and vessel activities (logistic)
▪Review the tendering HSE documents
